pr_title: DHFPROD-6060:View entity types in alphabetical order

timeline.bodyText:
I think it'd be better to sort these after they've been populated with "entityName". That minimizes the amount of code we have with knowledge of "info.title" meaning something important.
So build up the array, then sort it by entityName.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6060:View entity types in alphabetical order
